column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Are you kidding me? This is one of my favourite restaurants in the city of Chicago. Talk about tapas...everything I've gotten here has been orgasmically delicious. It is pricey
column2: but my friends and I save up and go every few months. A check-in will get you a free tapas desert! I love the Chicken piri piri and also the sangria is to die for. The wait is usually 2 hours on a weekend
column3: but we just hop over to Marquee bar and Cafe Baabs texts us when our table is ready. Good system! Less busy on weekdays
